Uses of Package
com.documentum.xml.xquery

  • Packages that use com.documentum.xml.xquery 
    Package Description
    com.documentum.com
    Provides an interface for accessing the DFC through OLE/COM.
    com.documentum.xml.xquery  
  • Classes in com.documentum.xml.xquery used by com.documentum.com 
    Class and Description
    IDfXQuery
    This interface provides functionality for running XQueries against a repository, returning the results as a XML DOM or byte stream.
  • Classes in com.documentum.xml.xquery used by com.documentum.xml.xquery 
    Class and Description
    IDfXQuery.FtQueryDebugOptions 
    IDfXQuery.FtQueryOptions
    These options are used when executing the xquery against a target of IDfXQueryTargets.DF_FULLTEXT.
    IDfXQuery.FtQueryOptions.FTQueryOptionType
    Specifies the type of the FtQueryOption
